name: Fill
desc: The object for setting a fill type and attachment for a componentâ€™s background fill.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of fill to apply.

items.name: attachment
items.desc: Indicates how the fill should behave when a user scrolls. Valid values:scroll (default): The fill scrolls along with its component.fixed: The fill stays at a fixed position within the viewport.
